name: Chemical Chaos (LD37)
description:
In this science-based game, make sure you keep all the experiments running properly. If you fail to regulate one of the experiments properly, then you might find your equipment spontaneously exploding, and if enough of those experiments fail, then it'll be game over. Can you bring out the master chemist within and keep all the experiments running?

This was my entry for Ludum Dare 37. It's the first 3D game I made for Ludum Dare, so it was fun and different to make!
